body.name: Bartnelli Pro Luxury Steam Iron for Clothes | New Powerful Steam Technology | Non-Stick Ceramic Soleplate, 1700 Watts with 3-Way Auto Shut Off, Premium Built Quality & Durability
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 30 mins
features: PRO LUXURY PRODUCT LINE - the #1 Best Selling ironing board brand, brings you the all-new highly rated "Pro luxury" steam iron with its Bartnelli trust and reliability our customers love so much!!

UNMATCHED QUALITY - Experience your clothes at their best (wrinkles-free) in seconds: Bartnelli’s new age electric iron with steam comes with a ceramic coated Non-Stick soleplate that provides even heat distribution for quick and powerful ironing. the soleplate comes with an anti-dripping feature.

BEST IN-CLASS STEAM - Customized ironing with steam bursts and temperature control: You can easily control the temperature and the clothes iron steam with the temperature control dial and steam knob for dry and steam ironing. Also, level up your ironing with the powerful steam burst feature.

ALL-POWERFULL - 1700 Watts of power runs the beast of ironing: With a lightweight of just 1.45kgs (3.2lbs), our clothing iron is super tough on wrinkles and instantly provides a spotless look in seconds. 1700 watts of power offers a temperature range of 70-120°C(158-428°F). The steam irons highest rated with auto shut off comes with separate settings for linen, wool, synthetic, cotton, and silk clothes.

LATEST MODERN DESIGN - An ergonomic build and aesthetics that you cannot get enough of: Bartnelli’s portable steam iron for clothes is sure to become a point of attraction wherever you keep it. The ergonomic build and sharp aesthetics come with an enhanced grip making it easy to use. Your iron passes through multiple strict QC tests and offers unmatched durability.

EFFORTLESS CLEANING AND MAINTENANCE - with self clean and anti-calc function: The anti-calc function takes care of reducing scale deposits while the self-clean feature allows you to maintain your iron effortlessly.

ADVANCED SAFETY FEATURES - 3-way auto shutoff for a safe and smooth ironing experience: Your portable iron automatically shuts off after reaching the appropriate temperature, i.e., after 8 minutes of inactivity (when placed in a vertical position), 30 seconds of inactivity (when placed in a horizontal position), and 30 seconds of inactivity (when the iron is tipped over on its side). Also, it starts heating again when you pick up the iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to spend less time on ironing and the iron itself since I only have a few clothes that need ironing. This iron fits the bill. It has enough weight and glides smoothly on the fabric. The steam mechanism works great and no leaks. I am very satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my mother to use for her quilting and she just loves it. Has lots of features and works very well. Very good quality considering the low cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What steam! it releases
reviews.reviewText: I like the slightly heavier weight of this iron, its smooth ceramic plate, and its functioning. It really warms up fast and, boy, what steam you can get (or you can set the steam lower if you like). One thing I would change which does not affect the ironing operation in any way is the on-off dial. It sits directly beneath the handle, and it is not that easy to see or set the settings. I put a dot of nail polish where the dial indicates 'off' and another dot where the machine says 'off'. That way I can line up the dots and be sure I have shut off the iron fully. I hope the manufacturer can redesign the settings dial or add these kinds of indicators. In any event I would buy this iron again in an instant for its value, functionality and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took me a while to get to use it. But when I did I was so glad I bought this one.. it got hot fast, the weight was great, settings was easy to figure out. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best iron on the market for 20dollars..
reviews.reviewText: Extremely, durable, amazing consistent steam..Its built well, and very modern looking.Also very big,but it's size is well worth it...better than the cheap black and decker, sunbeams, a lot of major brands..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bartnelli Pro Luxury Steam Iron for Clothes and I have to say it’s an amazing deal. The iron has a non-stick ceramic soleplate that glides smoothly over clothes and doesn’t leave any residue. It heats up quickly and has great steam power that helps remove wrinkles easily.The iron is also very durable and well-built. It has a 3-way auto shut off feature that ensures safety and prevents accidents. The iron is also very easy to use and has adjustable temperature settings that make it suitable for all types of fabrics.Overall, I would highly recommend the Bartnelli Pro Luxury Steam Iron for Clothes to anyone looking for a high-quality iron at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tough Iron for the price, feels Tron like or something.
reviews.reviewText: So I've had maybe 3 irons in my life, because it seems like they last forever, and I don't iron that much. I should, but I don't. Needed one in a pinch and didn't want to spend much, or just get the same brand name boring iron. This is a pretty sweet iron. It has some kind of Tron meets the Transformers design going on, is tough looking and seems well built. Also with the red it's somewhat Ferrari like, I dunno in a past life I was a designer, and this is a cool iron. And if you're a dude it's probably the manliest one out there, if you're looking for manly. It steams very well, honestly irons my clothes better than any other iron I've had so it doesn't just look good, it's fantastic at it's job! Shipped in one day in a very professional looking box. Amazing. 5/5 bro

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I was sold at first, But I have begun to wonder
reviews.reviewText: Out of the Box, this iron was a sure fire winner! So much so that I have purchased a 2nd one for my other house. Recently the 1st one (now 7 months old) has become hesitant to disperse a burst of steam when the button is depressed. The steam button itself now sits 1/2 way depressed and refuses to return to its normal height position. Starting to get frustrating as I iron my jeans or shirts. Will seek alternative if this persists or gets worse. May need to replace soon. Will try something different next time. Outside of the burst-of-steam button not functioning properly or when depressed, the Iron functions nicely. I can still use a spray bottle of water and the hot iron, but there's nothing like having that burst-of-steam when its necessary.

I'm a seamstress so I need a really good iron. I've had a Rowenta for 5 years but it had leakage issues that became unsafe so that's why I shopped around! I've never had an iron with a ceramic soleplate & so when I used this for the first time I was amazed, it literally floats over fabric! The heat disbursement is top notch & it's not really heavy, which is great if you have sore hands like mine! The ONLY criticism, & it's very minor, is the area where you pour the water in, it could be a tad more accessible, but as I say that's really no big deal. Ironing/pressing is going to be a true joy with this iron & I HIGHLY recommend it!!!
